original_title: WiFi at Rock Bottom: Something About Meth
overview: This is the story about Amancha Coon, a 20 something girl addicted to crystal meth. She tells the story of her journey in addiction to rehab, relapse, rehab, and relapse again. In this documentary she faces her demons head on just one week before she enters her last attempt at getting clean.
title: WiFi at Rock Bottom: Something About Meth
